msg.in-versioning: Please check the current node before adding a new node.
msg.cannot-save: An error occurred while saving the node.
msg.not-add-folder: Only files can be added to this folder.
msg.access-denied: Access denied. You do not have add permission at '{0}'.
msg.path-not-found: The path '{0}' was deleted or invalid.
msg.node-locked: Node '{0}' is locked. Please unlock this node before creating documents.
msg.node-isExist: This node already exists in '{0}' and is not allowed to be the same name as its sibling.
msg.get-dialog-path: An error occurred while getting the dialog path.
msg.new-jcr-template: An error occurred while creating a new template.

msg.fileType-empty: Please select a file type before saving this configuration.
msg.action-empty: Please select a folder with an action.
msg.message-empty: The "Custom Save Message" field is required in case you do not choose the redirect option, or the path is empty.
msg.get-template: An error occurred while accessing the template.
msg.set-template-option: An error occurred while setting the template option.
msg.do-select: An error occurred while selecting the location.

msg.remove-popup-first: You must close the edit pop-up before deleting this node.
msg.confirm-delete-action: Are you sure you want to delete this action?
msg.template-empty: The template of '{0}' is null or empty.
msg.template-null: The template is null or empty, or you do not have permission to access this template.
msg.access-denied: Access denied. You do not have permission to perform this action.

info.child-not-found: This node does not have any child ones.

msg.repository-exception: Cannot save this action. The name provided must not have an index as its final element.
msg.numberformat-exception: Cannot save this action. The name provided must not have '[' or ']'.
msg.existed-action: The action name '{0}' already exists. Please select another name.
msg.unable-add: Unable to add this action. This node is root or you do not have permision.
msg.no-permission-add: Access denied. You do not have the right to add an action here.
msg.access-denied: Access denied. You do not have permission to access this template.

msg.do-not-permission: You do not have permission to load the template of '{0}'.

msg.Invalid-input: The field '{0}' with the value '{1}' is invalid.
